item.title: Canâ€™t enable DNSBL/RBL in Plesk because itâ€™s greyed out
item.description: If you have a new Plesk installation and the following option is greyed out in Server -> Mail: Switch on spam protection based on DNS blackhole lists Just install the following RPM from Plesk: psa-qmail-rblsmtpd
